summary: A young woman living in an Irish fishing village inherits her late grandfather's estate, but is forced to spend three years in England training to be a proper lady to collect the fortune.
cast: Marion Davies|Onslow Stevens|J. Farrell MacDonald|Juliette Compton|Irene Browne|Tyrell Davis|Alan Mowbray|Doris Lloyd|Robert Greig|Nora Cecil|Geoffrey Gill|Billy Bevan|Dannie Mac Grant|Leyland Hodgson|Mary MacLaren|Donald Novis
